list.abs: ...那被觉察并且将被觉察一次，被一次又一次地觉察，并且只在此时此地被觉察的东西。而诗歌会是所有的转喻和隐喻的发展达到荒谬（ad absurdum）的所在。[29]这根本的“达到荒谬”（ad absurdum）——那种每一次只有一次，只能通过没有意义，没有理想的或.
归谬法(Reductio ad absurdum)－－解答上次的IQ题逻辑小趣味：谁在说假话？
英语词汇-数学词汇_专业词汇 ... reducible 可约的；可化简的 reductio ad absurdum 反证法; 归谬法 reduction formula 归约公式.

auth_sentence.content: The reductio ad absurdum is no way to make economic policy.
auth_sentence.res_content: The reductio ad absurdum is no way to make economic policy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The reductio ad absurdum is no way to make economic policy.

auth_sentence.content: The reductio ad absurdum of the pro-abortion side is Kermit Gosnell.
auth_sentence.res_content: The reductio ad absurdum of the pro-abortion side is Kermit Gosnell.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The reductio ad absurdum of the pro-abortion side is Kermit Gosnell.

auth_sentence.content: Why not just take this situation as a reductio ad absurdum?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why not just take this situation as a reductio ad absurdum?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why not just take this situation as a reductio ad absurdum?
